item.text: Joshua son of Nun sent two spies out from Shittim secretly and instructed them: “Find out what you can about the land, especially Jericho.” They stopped at the house of a prostitute named Rahab and spent the night there.

The <st data-num="04428" class="">king</st> of <st data-num="03405" class="">Jericho</st> <st data-num="0559" class="">received</st> this <st data-num="0559" class="">report:</st> “<st data-num="02009" class="">Note well</st>!<n id="1" /> <st data-num="01121 03478">Israelite</st> <st data-num="0582" class="">men</st> have <st data-num="0935" class="">come</st> <st data-num="02008" class="">here</st> <st data-num="03915" class="">tonight</st><n id="2" /> to <st data-num="02658" class="">spy on</st> the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st>.”

So the <st data-num="04428" class="">king</st> of <st data-num="03405" class="">Jericho</st> <st data-num="07971" class="">sent</st> <st data-num="0559" class="">this order</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> <st data-num="07343" class="">Rahab</st>:<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="03318" class="">Turn over</st><n id="2" /> the <st data-num="0376" class="">men</st> who <st data-num="0935" class="">came</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> you<n id="3" />—the ones <st data-num="0834" class="">who</st> <st data-num="0935" class="">came</st> to your <st data-num="01004" class="">house</st><n id="4" />—<st data-num="03588" class="">for</st> they have <st data-num="0935" class="">come</st> to <st data-num="02658" class="">spy on</st> the <st data-num="03605" class="">whole</st> <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st>!”

But the <st data-num="0802" class="">woman</st> <st data-num="03947 06845">hid</st> the <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> <st data-num="0376" class="">men</st><n id="1" /> and <st data-num="0559" class="">replied</st>, “<st data-num="03651" class="">Yes</st>, these <st data-num="0376" class="">men</st> <st data-num="0935" class="">were clients</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">of</st> mine,<n id="2" /> but I <st data-num="03808" class="">didn’t</st> <st data-num="03045" class="">know</st> <st data-num="0370" class="">where</st> <st data-num="01992" class="">they</st> came from.

When it <st data-num="01961" class="">was</st> time to <st data-num="05462" class="">shut</st> the city <st data-num="08179" class="">gate</st> for the <st data-num="02822" class="">night</st>, the <st data-num="0376" class="">men</st> <st data-num="03318" class="">left</st>.<n id="1" /> I <st data-num="03808" class="">don’t</st> <st data-num="03045" class="">know</st> <st data-num="0575" class="">where</st> <st data-num="0376" class="">they</st> were <st data-num="01980" class="">heading</st>. <st data-num="07291" class="">Chase</st> <st data-num="0310" class="">after</st> them <st data-num="04118" class="">quickly</st>, <st data-num="03588" class="">for</st> you have time to <st data-num="05381" class="">catch</st> them!”

(Now <st data-num="01931" class="">she</st> had <st data-num="05927" class="">taken</st> them <st data-num="05927" class="">up</st> to the <st data-num="01406" class="">roof</st> and had <st data-num="02934" class="">hidden</st> them in the <st data-num="06086" class="">stalks</st> of <st data-num="06593" class="">flax</st> she had <st data-num="06186" class="">spread out</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="01406" class="">roof</st>.)
Meanwhile, the king’s men tried to find them on the road to the Jordan River near the fords. The city gate was shut as soon as they set out in pursuit of them.
Now before the spies went to sleep, Rahab went up to the roof.
She said to the men, “I know the Lord is handing this land over to you. We are absolutely terrified of you, and all who live in the land are cringing before you.
For we heard how the Lord dried up the water of the Red Sea before you when you left Egypt and how you annihilated the two Amorite kings, Sihon and Og, on the other side of the Jordan.
When we heard the news, we lost our courage, and no one could even breathe for fear of you. For the Lord your God is God in heaven above and on earth below!
So now, promise me this with an oath sworn in the Lord’s name. Because I have shown allegiance to you, show allegiance to my family. Give me a solemn pledge

that you will <st data-num="02421" class="">spare the lives</st> of my <st data-num="01" class="">father</st>, <st data-num="0517" class="">mother</st>, <st data-num="0251" class="">brothers</st>, <st data-num="0269" class="">sisters</st>, and <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">who</st> belong to them, and will <st data-num="05337" class="">rescue</st> <st data-num="05315" class="">us</st><n id="1" /> from <st data-num="04194" class="">death</st>.”
The men said to her, “If you die, may we die too! If you do not report what we’ve been up to, then we will show unswerving allegiance to you when the Lord hands the land over to us.”
Then Rahab let them down by a rope through the window. (Her house was built as part of the city wall; she lived in the wall.)

She <st data-num="0559" class="">told</st> them, “<st data-num="01980" class="">Head</st><n id="1" /> to the <st data-num="02022" class="">hill country</st>, <st data-num="06435" class="">so</st> <st data-num="07291" class="">the ones chasing</st> you <st data-num="06435" class="">don’t</st> <st data-num="06293" class="">find</st> you.<n id="2" /> <st data-num="02247" class="">Hide</st> from them <st data-num="08033" class="">there</st> for <st data-num="07969" class="">three</st> <st data-num="03117" class="">days</st>, <st data-num="05704" class="">long enough for</st> <st data-num="07291" class="">those chasing</st> you<n id="3" /> to <st data-num="07725" class="">return</st>. <st data-num="0310" class="">Then</st> you can <st data-num="01980" class="">be</st> on your <st data-num="01870" class="">way</st>.”

The <st data-num="0376" class="">men</st> <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> her, “<st data-num="0587" class="">We</st> are <st data-num="05355" class="">not bound</st> by <st data-num="02088" class="">this</st> <st data-num="07621 0834">oath</st> you made us <st data-num="07650" class="">swear</st> unless the following conditions are met:<n id="1" />

<st data-num="02009" class="">When</st> <st data-num="0587" class="">we</st> <st data-num="0935" class="">invade</st> the <st data-num="0776" class="">land,</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="07194" class="">tie</st> <st data-num="02088" class="">this</st> <st data-num="08144" class="">red</st> <st data-num="08615 02339">rope</st><n id="2" /> in the <st data-num="02474" class="">window</st> through <st data-num="0834" class="">which</st> you <st data-num="03381" class="">let</st> us <st data-num="03381" class="">down</st>, and <st data-num="0622" class="">gather together</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">in</st> your <st data-num="01004" class="">house</st> your <st data-num="01" class="">father</st>, <st data-num="0517" class="">mother</st>, <st data-num="0251" class="">brothers</st>, and <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> who live in your <st data-num="01" class="">father’s</st> <st data-num="01004" class="">house</st>.<n id="3" />

<st data-num="03605" class="">Anyone</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">who</st> <st data-num="03318 01817 02351">leaves</st> your <st data-num="01004" class="">house</st> will be <st data-num="07218" class="">responsible</st> for his own <st data-num="01818" class="">death</st>—<st data-num="0587" class="">we</st> are <st data-num="05355" class="">innocent</st> in that case!<n id="1" /> But <st data-num="0518" class="">if</st> <st data-num="03605 0834 01961">anyone</st> <st data-num="0854" class="">with</st> you in the <st data-num="01004" class="">house</st> is <st data-num="03027 01961">harmed</st>, we will be <st data-num="01818 07218">responsible</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="0518" class="">If</st> you should <st data-num="05046" class="">report</st> <st data-num="01697" class="">what</st> we’ve been <st data-num="02088" class="">up to</st>,<n id="1" /> we <st data-num="01961" class="">are</st> <st data-num="05355" class="">not bound</st> by this <st data-num="07621 0834">oath</st> you made us <st data-num="07650" class="">swear</st>.”

She <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st>, “I <st data-num="03651 01931">agree</st> to these <st data-num="01697" class="">conditions</st>.”<n id="1" /> She <st data-num="07971" class="">sent</st> them <st data-num="01980" class="">on</st> their <st data-num="01980" class="">way</st><n id="2" /> and then <st data-num="07194" class="">tied</st> the <st data-num="08144" class="">red</st> <st data-num="08615" class="">rope</st> in the <st data-num="02474" class="">window</st>.

They <st data-num="01980 0935">went</st><n id="1" /> to the <st data-num="02022" class="">hill country</st> and <st data-num="03427" class="">stayed</st> <st data-num="08033" class="">there</st> for <st data-num="07969" class="">three</st> <st data-num="03117" class="">days</st>, <st data-num="05704" class="">long enough for</st> <st data-num="07291" class="">those chasing</st> them<n id="2" /> to <st data-num="07725" class="">return</st>. Their <st data-num="07291" class="">pursuers</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="01245" class="">looked</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> along the <st data-num="01870" class="">way</st> but did <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="04672" class="">find</st> them.<n id="4" />

Then the <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> <st data-num="0376" class="">men</st> <st data-num="07725" class="">returned</st>—they <st data-num="03381" class="">came down</st> from the <st data-num="02022" class="">hills</st>, <st data-num="05674" class="">crossed</st> the river,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="0935" class="">came</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> <st data-num="03091" class="">Joshua</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="05126" class="">Nun</st>, and <st data-num="05608" class="">reported</st> to him <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> <st data-num="0854" class="">they</st> had <st data-num="04672" class="">discovered</st>.
They told Joshua, “Surely the Lord is handing over all the land to us! All who live in the land are cringing before us!”
